column2: Job Description The role is highly varied and agile, evolving over time and it will enable to gain broad experience across delivery, commercial and business support and has the potential to be a key enabling role which will accelerate growth and success of Banking & Insurance verticals. The Senior Delivery Manager role will be responsible for customer engagements/projects for the strategic clients and will direct the team involved in these engagements, to deliver the required outcomes (scope, schedule, cost, quality), and in so doing, achieve the agreed gross margin. Reporting will be to the Engineering Leaders of Banking & Insurance to support the project delivery team while generally delegating the responsibility for project planning & execution to meet customer expectations to a Project/Program Manager. The Senior Delivery Manager is a key member of both the verticals, collectively leading on growth, employee satisfaction, customer satisfaction & profitability. Lead & guide the cross-functional and global teams with diverse styles, skills, and abilities across cultures with communication, negotiation, influencing and conflict resolution skills Ensuring and retention of customer satisfaction with the commercial responsibility of creating new opportunities with the clients managed. This will entail the selling/creation of opportunities to keep engaged with the customer ideally in a more strategic value add role. Responsible for ensuring a smooth, seamless transition into Support or Managed Services (BAU) once the project/Launch is complete. Involve or seek the involvement of appropriate stakeholders when required. As a key part of the management team, l champion the Core Values and support operations (reporting, controls and overall governance). Work closely with the Sales/Pre-Sales/CSM teams. Actively drive demand across client base to develop new and existing opportunities. Support efforts to challenge for new opportunities. This may include RFP, Estimations, proposal development, creating reusable collateral and participating in Sales/Pre-Sales meetings with customers/prospective customers Drive and Promote Value Add initiatives on customer engagements Continue to optimize the cost of IT (while maintaining high quality IT standards) through various levers including automation, Implement and optimize scrum processes in JIRA and Continuously monitors the scrum processes to increase efficiency Drive Agile adoption and create self-sufficient strong hands-on team in driving faster deployment cycles Establish measurable performance goals to gauge quality of service and improvements over time Monitor, control, and support service delivery; ensuring systems, methodologies and procedures are in place and followed Ensure positive relationships with key stakeholders (internal & client) are maintained Additionally: Have a minimum of 15-18 years experience with 5-10 years of experience in large-scale applications and 5 years experience in people management. Have excellent coding skills in one of the languages PHP/Python/C /Java and coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations. Have deep, hands-on technical expertise in high scale, service-oriented architectures. Primary Responsibilities: Lead & guide the cross-functional and global teams with diverse styles, skills, and abilities across cultures with communication, negotiation, influencing and conflict resolution skills Ensuring and retention of customer satisfaction with the commercial responsibility of creating new opportunities with the clients managed. This will entail the selling/creation of opportunities to kee As a key part of the management team, l champion the Core Values and support operations (reporting, controls and overall governance). Work closely with the Sales/Pre-Sales/CSM teams. Actively drive demand across client base to develop new and existing opportunities. Support efforts to challenge for new opportunities. This may includ Monitor, control, and support service delivery; ensuring systems, methodologies and procedures are in place and followed

column2: ?   Alright, so youre sold. But who are we    Diversity and humility are not just big words hung up on the walls. At CredAble, we put people at the heart of everything we do and our core values are the driving force behind our success.     CredAble is a technology-powered supply chain funding solutions company and NBFC. Leveraging our trade finance expertise, technology platform, and access to 3rd party capital, we arrange funding programs for enterprise supply chains. Led by a team of industry experts, CredAble is at the forefront of powering tech-enabled working capital financing. Programs are anchored around enterprise clients, where we provide funding linked to transactions with suppliers (payables) and distributors (receivables). Investors in CredAble include Alpha Capital, an India-focused investment manager investing in consumer- focused and/or disruptive technology-enabled businesses.     ?   Roles and Responsibilities:      Develop and execute strategies for the collections department in alignment with the company s objectives and policies.         Build and provide leadership to the collections team, ensuring a high level of performance and productivity.         Oversee the recovery of outstanding debts related to unsecured and business loans, monitoring and improving collection processes.         Ensure collections are being managed properly; determine appropriate corrective action to take when confronted with accounts receivable discrepancies; take initiative to assure that corrective action is completed including personal visit of high POS cases in default.         Analyse collection data and create reports to track performance, identify trends, and implement necessary changes to enhance results.         Collaborate with other departments, such as risk management and credit, to mitigate potential losses and streamline the collections process.         Ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements and standards in all collection activities.         Identify and implement use of collection systems and tools for maximum efficiency.     Qualifications and Requirements:      Any graduate or Postgraduate.         Experience in a senior collections role within the banking or financial services sector.         Demonstrated success in implementing and managing collections strategies that resulted in improved recovery rates and operational efficiency.         Strong leadership skills with the ability to lead, mentor, and motivate a team     The perks of working at CredAble:    We ve got benefits that go beyond just free food! We are a digital-first company that believes in embracing the future of work and investing in our people.   Comprehensive health insurance packages    Your physical and mental health is highly important to us. Which is why we have made employee health and workplace well-being our top priority. We ve also got you covered with group health, parental and accidental insurance.   Unlimited sick leave    Struggling with serious health concerns We say, take em when you need em! Extended sick leave to help you recover completely.   Paid time off    Every once in a while, we want you to be able to take a break rest, recharge and unwind in the company of your loved ones. This is why we have a month long sabbatical for newly married employees and for those who complete 3 years with the organization.     ?   Parental leave with childcare monetary benefits    We get that parenthood is a big change bigger than many anticipate. Calling all new parents! Moms Dads! Expansive maternity and paternity benefits which not only includes paid leaves but also work from home option, giving you time to spend with your newest member in the family. For new mothers flexible returning to work, a baby care allowance of Rs. 2.5 Lakh is provided.   Generous rewards    ?     We celebrate our people with rewards, recognition and more! On achieving the company targets, you will be taken on a fun offsite. Outstanding contributors will be invited to the yearly offsite with the senior management and will also be given financial incentives for their performance. We ve even got free merchandise and peer-cash bonuses for you!   Unlimited food on the house    From all-day snacks, gourmet evening refreshments, team lunches dinners to monthly food allowances, we re making sure you never go hungry! Our Open Bar, Food and Game nights every quarter are quite a hit with the team. You can even invite your friends and family over for evening refreshments once a month!

column2: Role & responsibilities  :  Keep tracking outstanding debts. Plan a course of action to recover the owed money. Locate and contact debtors.  Update the account status and database regularly. Comply with requirements when legal action is unavoidable. Handle customers' questions or complaints. Negotiate payoff deadlines and payment plans. Build trust with debtors.  Identify gaps in the system and recommend solutions. Preferred candidate profile  :  Exceptionally strong communication and negotiation skills  ??Dedicated to recovering debt that is rightfully owed  Perks and benefits     1.   Insurance:   This category includes all types of health insurance (medical, dental, vision), as well as life insurance and disability insurance. 2.   Additional compensation: The opportunity to earn money beyond an employees regular salary can be made available through commissions, bonuses, and performance awards. 3.   Time off: People need breaks from their regular work schedule, and competitive employers understand the worth of granting time off with pay. Holidays, sick leave, vacations, family leave, bereavement leave, and sabbaticals are all desirable to employees.
